page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Blair Thompson.}Usually my family rises about 7 a.m.Normally I dress before breakfast. Our family have breakfast at different times. At about 8 a.m. my Dad leaves to work in Edinburgh for British Telecom. We chose to stay in Livingston because it lies between Glasgow and Edinburgh. My Mum works in Whitdale Primary as a teacher and at 8.30 we all depart for school. My school,{Meldrum Primary,}is a semi-open plan one. We have lunch at 12.15 p.m. and I usually eat at the school cafeteria. At 3.15 we go home. In our area there is a wood and I spend a lot of time there with friends while my parents work around the home. We have dinner in the evening and later watch television or play on the computer. I am a Scout and my little brother,Scott,is a Cub Scout.
